## Plugin Information

**Plugin Name:**

**MCP Server:** (e.g., @modelcontextprotocol/server-chrome-devtools)

**Description:** (Brief description of what the plugin does)

**Author:** (Your name/username)

## Checklist

Before submitting, ensure you have:

- [ ] Generated the plugin using mcp2skill-tools (mcp2scripts)
- [ ] Tested the plugin locally
- [ ] Plugin uses mcp2rest for MCP communication
- [ ] Included complete plugin.json with metadata
- [ ] Created agent definition in `agents/` directory
- [ ] Skills are in `skills/` directory with SKILL.md
- [ ] Added comprehensive README.md
- [ ] Updated marketplace.json
- [ ] All skills work correctly
- [ ] Documented prerequisites and setup instructions
